segments.text: First, I would say, full collaboration, but now we have council.

Discord, come out there. Discord, fight on.
So, we're glad to have the Discord support today, and hopefully also the viewers support today.
Because today will be a very very passionate, and dangerous, and fun, and exciting event!

No, not me. Everybody's co-drivers here.
I may be a bad driver, but I'll drive you guys nuts.

It's all fine, maybe we'll do it some more often in the future
So please don't stress yourself out, let's just have fun today!
I think we will go to the rules
Ah, but before that, let me say thank you
The hats and the cards are sponsored by Ninomai Inanis
Everyone switch to the rose image, please

Tournament rules. Easy. There's not many rules. Basically, all characters, all courses are allowed. However, if you choose, please do not choose random courses. Please choose a certain course that you want to actually race. But if that course has been used before, like if it has actually been chosen before, please do not choose the same course again.

All right. Understand. Understand. Understand. Understand. Number two, items are allowed. Number three, we are racing in 150 CC with no assist. Everyone, please check if you have turned off your assist. I think you can check by pressing Y.
Alright, I think I turned it off now.
If you press Y and select your character...
At the point where you select the card, you can press on the plus button.
And that's where you see the three options on the right side.
If you press L, if there's a sign that says no...
Then it's all just staring off
That's how it's supposed to be
It's supposed to be crossed out
Yeah, it's supposed to be crossed out, exactly
The other ones you can ignore
I also want to quickly let you guys know
I'm going to be on auto-mute this whole time
So unless I have something to say, I'm going to be muted
Don't worry if I'm a little quiet
I'm still here with you guys in spirit
And next rule, oh yeah, there's no more rules, it's basically just a system
We're doing the first cup, all versus all, big mixer, four races each
And then we get, we mute each other by the way during the race
Just to focus everyone on what we're driving
And then we get back together in Discord, talk a little bit
Then we go to the second cup which is EN versus ID, 6 versus 6
Yes, yes. That's when we will separate each other in the voice channels by team.
In this one, we will actually talk with one another, if you wanna.
And then we give some comments together again when we get all back together in the same channel.
And then we do the third cup with randomly thrown together teams.
No EN vs ID, but like all mixed together naturally. Beautiful!
Random, random. We will just like... I'll count down and then everyone joins either voice chat room 0 or voice chat room 1.
What if everyone joins the same room though?
Well then we're gonna have to do it again.
What is this guy? What is this?
And by the way, just so you know, those team cups will basically be the same system as all versus all
The difference is just basically like if you throw items like red shells or whatever
And there is a teammate in front of you, it will not go to the teammate obviously
It will go directly to the closest opponent driver that's around you
So that's how that team system works
